channel.title: Need help with coding in general, im so confused
channel.description: I see all these wonderful coders making new servers and never been seen things that people are so impressed with then i go into this help section and ask for help then people make it so confusing. I always hear people talking about "arrays" and "booleans" or w/e and im so confused. I always wonder how people know this stuff and how they code this stuff into their servers. I'm lucky if i can add and item on object code. So I have looked all around google and on here and on other moparscape forums and I cannot find anything what so ever. So I'm looking for someone who could tutor or help me or just inform me a little so that i don't feel so noobish not knowing how to code anything

item.title: Need help with coding in general, im so confused
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

sheepy:

If you do not know what arrays or booleans are right off the bat, you need to give this all up! Your a fucken dumb ass!

I’m sure you did AT FIRST TO?

Read full topic

In my opinion I think you have no room to be calling people dumb, because coming in here an flaming and calling people names without even knowing anyhitng shows how much of a dumbass you are yourself.
